text: John "Jack" Davis (born 1933) is an American industrialist and perennial candidate. Davis is the owner of I Squared R Element Company, which he founded in the 1960s. Davis ran four times for New York's 26th congressional district seat in the U.S. House of Representatives between 2004 and 2011, three times as a Democrat (twice as the general election candidate against incumbent Tom Reynolds and a third time in a three-way primary) and once as an independent. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:Businesspeople from New York (state) Category:Politicians from New York (state) Category:Independent politicians in the United States
title: Jack Davis (industrialist)
